thread.title: Sorry, Bernie Sanders. Deodorant isn’t starving America’s children.
thread.title_full: Sorry, Bernie Sanders. Deodorant isn’t starving America’s children.

author: Grizz1
title: Sorry, Bernie Sanders. Deodorant isn’t starving America’s children.
text: Posts: 1,126 Sorry, Bernie Sanders. Deodorant isnt starving Americas children. If 99 percent of all the new income goes to the top 1 percent, you could triple it, it wouldn't matter much to the average middle class person. The whole size of the economy and the GDP doesn't matter if people continue to work longer hours for low wages and you have 45 million people living in poverty. You can't just continue growth for the sake of growth in a world in which we are struggling with climate change and all kinds of environmental problems. All right? You don't necessarily need a choice of 23 underarm spray deodorants or of 18 different pairs of sneakers when children are hungry in this country. Hey Bernie, how much of my money do you want?
